page.title: 07Clubs
page.content:
One of Tayports many clubs is { {Scotscraig bowling club,}which has 120 members and has 6 rinks on the green.
There is a club called the{Dolphin for children and teenagers,who can play pool,snooker,football,hockey,and table tennis.The{Dolphin}centre has a tuck shop and one entrance,but it is being extended at the moment,to improve the facilities.
There is a{British legion}club in Tayport. There are also a{Masonic lodge,{Amateur musical society, {Horticultural society,}and a{Homing {pigeon club,}the{scouts,}the girl {Guides,}and also the{Boys Brigade. These clubs provide a wide choice of leisure activities for the people of our block.
